participant_1.background:
I sometimes forget to feed my cats on time.
I have a MacBook Pro, which is a great computer for me because it is powerful and portable.
i do not have a college degree.
My family are avid cyclists as well
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights.
I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
i am active on my city council.
i have an internship at a computer company.

content.text: Pretty good, I just got back from a bike ride.
Nice, I love biking. I used to bike every day when I lived in a smaller city.
What do you do for fun?
I love to read and I'm active in my city council.
That's awesome, I'm always looking for new books to read. I'm not very political but I love learning about how the world works.
I have an internship at a computer company right now and I love learning about technology. It's really interesting to see how the world is changing.
That's really cool. I wish I was more tech-savvy. I have a MacBook Pro but I'm not very good at using it.
Don't worry, I'm still learning too. It's a lot to take in but it's really fun to learn new things.
I know, I love learning new things. I'm also really passionate about Halloween.
Halloween is my favorite holiday! I love dressing up and going to parties.
Me too! I love making my own costumes and I love seeing what other people come up with.
I'm so glad we're having this conversation. It's so nice to talk to someone who shares my interests.
